==Descriptions==
{{Description|A young Koholasaurus with the ability to swim through water and liquid phlogiston.<br>Their skin and flippers are still soft and tender, to the point that they can't even tolerate hot environments for long periods like adults. However, one day, they will grow into the form that can swim freely through the water.|[[Archive]]}}
